CompanyDescription: Monro is a chain of 1,283 Company-operated stores (as of March 28, 2020), 98 franchised locations, eight wholesale locations, three retread facilities and two dealer-operated stores providing automotive undercar repair and tire sales and services in the United States. At March 28, 2020, Monro operated Company stores in 32 states, including Arkansas, California, Connecticut, Delaware, Florida, Georgia, Idaho, Illinois, Indiana, Iowa, Kentucky, Louisiana, Maine, Maryland, Massachusetts, Michigan, Minnesota, Missouri, Nevada, New Hampshire, New Jersey, New York, North Carolina, Ohio, Pennsylvania, Rhode Island, South Carolina, Tennessee, Vermont, Virginia, West Virginia and Wisconsin, primarily under the names "Monro Auto Service and Tire Centers," "Tread Quarters Discount Tire Auto Service Centers," "Mr.  ...
